item.title: APPLIED INDUSTRIAL TECHNOLOGIES INC 10-K
item.description: APPLIED INDUSTRIAL TECHNOLOGIES INC, which is in the Wholesale-Machinery, Equipment & Supplies [5080] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 12, 2022 had 24554 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
